backend/main.mo: Canister backend managing public and personal songs with access control, storage mixins, and CRUD-style upload and query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a header UI update to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing styles, components, hooks, and UI behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens for light/dark themes and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up Fourleaf branding, favicon, and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, theme provider, and global toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Route guard enforcing login and admin checks, showing appropriate UI for denied or loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/GrantAdmin: Admin tool allowing existing admins to grant admin access by validating and submitting a Principal ID.
frontend/src/components/admin/RequestAdm: Access-denied card displaying the caller's Principal ID with copy support and loading fallback.
frontend/src/components/admin/SongEditor: Dialog for creating or editing songs, handling metadata fields, file selection, and upload progress using ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button that triggers login or logout via Internet Identity with UI state handling.
frontend/src/components/branding/Fourlea: Renders Fourleaf branding SVG in multiple layout variants (full, compact, icon).
frontend/src/components/catalog/CatalogS: Displays a song row with cover art, metadata, play controls, duration, and download button.
frontend/src/components/catalog/Download: Download button enforcing auth and subscription checks, handling audio download and UI states.
frontend/src/components/catalog/PublicSo: Dialog for uploading public songs with validation, file handling, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/home/HorizontalS: Horizontal scroll container with snap behavior for arranging child items.
frontend/src/components/home/StreamingCa: Song card with cover art and play control that triggers transition context for the audio queue.
frontend/src/components/home/StreamingSe: Section wrapper for streaming content with title, optional icon, and optional Show All button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with sidebars, header, outlet content, audio player, and conditional profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderSea: Implements a search bar with home navigation, a browse menu, and query management with UI sound effects.
frontend/src/components/layout/HomeTabBa: Renders a simple tab bar to switch between All, Music, and Podcast home browsing tabs.
frontend/src/components/layout/LeftSideb: Provides a navigational sidebar with mobile drawer behavior, admin links, and UI sound controls.
frontend/src/components/layout/RightDeta: Shows details for the currently playing song or a placeholder when nothing is playing, visible on large screens.
frontend/src/components/personal/Persona: A dialog for uploading personal songs with validation, file handling, progress tracking, and authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/player/AudioPlay: Implements the persistent audio player with playback controls, streaming logic, state sync, and queue handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog that prompts new authenticated users to enter name and subscription status and saves the profile via mutations.
frontend/src/components/settings/UISound: UI panel to toggle UI sound effects and adjust volume using settings from a Zustand store.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioQueue.ts: Zustand store managing the audio playback queue, current track state, playback controls, and UI transitions.
frontend/src/hooks/useHeaderSearch.ts: Zustand store holding the header search query with setters and clear functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomeBrowsing.ts: Zustand store handling the active home tab and scroll-to-browsing triggers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, persistence, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating songs, profiles, and related backend data via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUISounds.ts: Hook that loads a click sound and provides a function to play it respecting UI sound settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useUISoundSettings.ts: Persistent Zustand store for enabling UI sounds and controlling their volume.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark modes, and custom utilities including scroll hiding, snap scrolling, hero background, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin interface for viewing, creating, editing, and deleting catalog songs with dialogs, stats, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryPage.tsx: Public library page showing all songs with search, browsing tabs, recommendations, playback handling, and upload dialog.
frontend/src/pages/MyLibraryPage.tsx: Displays a user's personal song library with login gating, search, playback, upload, and deletion features.
frontend/src/pages/NowPlayingPage.tsx: Full‑screen now‑playing view with artwork, playback controls, progress/volume sliders, and navigation back to the main UI.
frontend/src/pages/PlayerLayoutPage.tsx: Player UI layout with playback controls, track list, and integration with the audio queue and song catalog.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Renders pricing plans with feature lists, highlighting the most popular option and offering a trial button.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Converts backend error messages into simplified, user-friendly strings with special cases handled.
frontend/src/utils/uploadValidation.ts: Validates audio files, cover images, durations, and required fields with size limits and basic checks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the Fourleaf UI.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, pending requests, and app UI enhancement context.
